Reviews.Title: “Excellent location & wonderful service!”
Reviews.Author: Kikujiro
Reviews.Content: stayed orient express hotel 2026 november fullest satisfaction main reasons chose hotel excellent location close major historic sights istanbul topkapi palace hagia sophia blue mosque hippodrome basilica cistern archaeology museum turkish islamic arts museum egyptian bazaar galata bridge walking distance hotel furthermore hotel close tram stop 1015 minutes bus station service hotel arrival beautiful guest relations manager help planning trips town arrival istanbul picked airport taxi hotel arranged wait guests sharing minivan ride hotel quick smooth hotel welcomed hot apple tea nicely furnished lobby hotel arrange trips own travel plan advance service european hotels class example amsterdam london paris free turkish delight bed nice touch stop eating started shower bath tub usual anemities soap shampoo hairdryer airconditioner coffee tea facilities safe walls bit thin hear muffled sounds people sleeping breakfast buffet excellent offers wide variety local products skipped lunch couple times ate morning service employees breakfast supervision wonderful mehmet breakfast staff cheerful talk regularly food replenished pleasant stay orient express hotel probably stay future trips istanbul
